menu.name: Mexican Croquettes
menu.description: Delicious croquettes filled with spicy chicken, crunchy nacho batter, and a hint of guacamole (two units).

menu.name: Steak Tartar
menu.description: Succulent finely chopped beef served raw, marinated with Dijon mustard, cane honey, mayonnaise with capers, pickles, and onions.

menu.name: Málaga Salchichón Tartar
menu.description: Traditional Málaga salchichón finely cut and served raw, marinated with Dijon mustard, cane honey, mayonnaise with capers, pickles, and onions.

menu.name: Ham and Cheese Platter
menu.description: Gourmet cheese platter served with dried fruits and strawberry jam (ask the waiter for today's cheese, gluten-free and nut-free options available).

menu.name: Cheese Platter for 2
menu.description: Gourmet cheese platter served with dried fruits and strawberry jam (ask the waiter for today's cheese, gluten-free and nut-free options available).

menu.name: Cheese Platter for 4
menu.description: Gourmet cheese platter served with dried fruits and strawberry jam (ask the waiter for today's cheese, gluten-free and nut-free options available).

menu.name: Córdoba Flamenquín
menu.description: Pork flamenquín (rolled ham and breaded pork) with pimiento and cheese, served on a bed of potatoes.

menu.name: Grilled Asparagus
menu.description: Grilled asparagus wrapped in bacon with melted goat cheese.

menu.name: Chichilla de Morcilla Toast
menu.description: Crispy toast with chichilla de morcilla Iberian spicy sausage (from Fuente Obejuna, Córdoba).

menu.name: Croquette Assortment
menu.description: A delicious selection of six croquettes, including two of each of our unique flavors.

menu.name: Chicken Lollipops
menu.description: Crispy and tender chicken lollipops with honey mustard sauce.

menu.name: Grilled Artichokes
menu.description: Grilled fresh artichokes (two units) with quail egg and crispy bacon bits (gluten-free option available).

menu.name: Soria Torreznos
menu.description: An ideal dish for sharing, served with chili peppers and lime.

menu.name: Moroccan Brownie
menu.description: Grilled apple, morcilla de los Pedroches, manchego cheese ice cream, and mozzarella bread.

menu.name: Pulled Pork Taco
menu.description: Two crispy corn tacos filled with guacamole, shredded pork in BBQ sauce, pico de gallo (vegetable mix), and lime.

menu.name: Mini Beef Frankfurt
menu.description: Mini hot dog with beef sausage or vegetarian sausage, pico de gallo (mix of red and green peppers and red onion), mayonnaise with kimchi, served with fried yuca.

menu.name: Patacón
menu.description: Shredded pork with tomato sofrito, three-cheese sauce, and guacamole on fried green plantain (two units). Can be made vegetarian or vegan.

menu.name: Brioche Calamari
menu.description: Squid sandwich on brioche bread with sriracha sauce, served with yuca (two units).

menu.name: Battered Cod
menu.description: Battered cod with garlic aioli.

menu.name: Tuna Tacos
menu.description: Tuna marinated in sriracha mayo, served on corn tacos with guacamole.

menu.name: Anchovy Platter
menu.description: Fresh anchovies served with crispy crystal bread and gazpacho. A unique experience for anchovy lovers (gluten-free option available).

menu.name: Russian Salad
menu.description: Russian salad made with potatoes, carrots, tuna, eggs, black olives, and mayonnaise mousse (gluten-free option available).

menu.name: Prawn Lollipops
menu.description: Breaded prawns served with a sweet chili sauce.

menu.name: Spinach Croquettes
menu.description: Delicious homemade spinach croquettes with goat cheese.

menu.name: Vegetarian Mini Burger
menu.description: Vegetarian patty burger with goat cheese, piquillo pepper, caramelized onions, and quail egg, served with sweet potato fries.

menu.name: Grilled Asparagus with Goat Cheese
menu.description: Grilled asparagus with melted goat cheese.

menu.name: Vegetarian Mini Frankfurt
menu.description: Mini hot dog with vegetarian sausage, pico de gallo (mix of red and green peppers and red onion), served with yuca.

menu.name: Patatas Bravas
menu.description: Diced potatoes topped with our delicious spicy brava sauce mousse.

menu.name: Camembert Cheese
menu.description: Fried Camembert cheese, crispy on the outside and creamy on the inside, served with tomato chutney.

menu.name: Vegetarian Russian Salad
menu.description: Vegetarian Russian salad made with potatoes, carrots, eggs, black olives, and mayonnaise mousse (gluten-free option available).

menu.name: Grilled Fresh Artichokes (Vegetarian)
menu.description: Fresh grilled artichokes (two units) with a quail egg (vegan or gluten-free options available upon request).

menu.name: Vegetarian Patacón
menu.description: Mixed vegetables, three-cheese sauce, and guacamole on fried green plantain (two units), vegan option available.

menu.name: Shrimp Fetén Salad
menu.description: Fresh vegetable salad with breaded shrimp, goat cheese, pumpkin seeds, and honey mustard dressing.

menu.name: Chicken Fetén Salad
menu.description: Salad with chicken, goat cheese, pumpkin seeds, and honey mustard dressing. (You can choose between fried or grilled chicken).

menu.name: Tomato with Ventresca
menu.description: Tomato with Ventresca tuna and olive oil, vegan option available.

menu.name: Salmon Salad
menu.description: Smoked salmon, mixed lettuces, manchego cheese, walnuts, avocado, and Fetén vinaigrette.

menu.name: Red Tuna Salad
menu.description: Red tuna salad with avocado, manchego cheese, walnuts, wakame seaweed, and cherry tomatoes.

menu.name: Tuna Mini Burger
menu.description: Mini tuna burger with seared tuna loin (rare), caramelized onion, kimchi mayo, and served with fried sweet potato.

menu.name: Chicken Mini Burger
menu.description: Mini chicken burger with goat cheese and caramelized onion, served with fried sweet potato.

menu.name: Beef Mini Burger
menu.description: Beef patty, goat cheese or manchego cheese, and caramelized onion, served with fried sweet potato.

menu.name: Mexican Mini Burger
menu.description: Mini Mexican burger with beef, guacamole, chipotle sauce, and caramelized onion, served with fried sweet potato.

menu.name: Blood Sausage Mini Burger
menu.description: Delicious blood sausage burger with caramelized onion and manchego cheese, served with fried sweet potato.

menu.name: Chicken Churrasco
menu.description: Grilled chicken churrasco with chimichurri sauce, served with fried potatoes.

menu.name: Beef Tenderloin
menu.description: Beef tenderloin (250-300 grams) grilled, served with wrinkled potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

menu.name: Iberian Pluma Plate
menu.description: Iberian pluma cut, served with potatoes, padrón peppers, and bacon-wrapped asparagus.

menu.name: Fetén Octopus
menu.description: Octopus with potatoes, sweet potato cream, and honey.

menu.name: Salmon
menu.description: Grilled salmon with potatoes, asparagus, and piquillo peppers.

menu.name: Grilled Sea Bream
menu.description: Grilled sea bream with asparagus, cherry tomatoes, and potatoes, served with sweet potato honey sauce and green sauce (olive oil, garlic, and parsley).

menu.name: Brownie
menu.description: Delicious chocolate brownie.

menu.name: Cheesecake
menu.description: Classic creamy cheesecake.

menu.name: Chocolate Death
menu.description: Decadent chocolate dessert with a rich, smooth texture.

menu.name: Torrija
menu.description: French toast soaked in milk and egg, fried and sprinkled with sugar.
